params.amountA: Amount of token A to add
params.amountB: Amount of token B to add
params.minLiquidity: Minimum liquidity tokens to mint (slippage protection)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.liquidity: Amount of liquidity tokens to burn
params.minAmountA: Minimum amount of token A to receive
params.minAmountB: Minimum amount of token B to receive

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.minAmountOut: Minimum amount of output token (slippage protection)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get liquidity balance for an address

getAmountIn(address,uint256).notice: Quote exact output amount for given input

getAmountOut(address,uint256).notice: Get quote for exact input amount

getReserves().notice: Get current reserves and total supply
